title: Really weird convo (ANSWER POLL)

replies.body:
> [6:26PM] **[REMOVED]**: hey u mother fker

That's when you should of pressed "Block Player"
I know 5 year olds that shit talk better (actually i guess the kid is 6 now, but you get the point.)

> [6:37PM] XXX: u made lots of fun for me

Yeah it does seem like they're like <10 years old or something from this line. But who knows. Really though, they need to learn some basic decency.
